ygData.subject: Re: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, well, I m level 39 now so cash comes in more freely. Giants drop 0-35plat usually, might wipe out a few dozen giants in a day. Most any monster I kill
ygData.messageBody:
> I think a lot of you people gushing about how easy it is to make money via
> loot are exaggerating. I have a 23rd monk that works his butt off and he's
> never had more than about 125pp in the bank at any one time. I've spent time
> in unrest. Where's the money there? FS weapons? The cash drops aren't
> *that* great.
>
> So if you have some advice for a player that is really tired of reading about
> how others have more than 1,000pp in the bank, let 'er rip.

Hmm, well, I'm level 39 now so cash comes in more freely. Giants drop
0-35plat usually, might wipe out a few dozen giants in a day. Most any
monster I kill drops 4 plat in cash, plus fine steel a third of the time
(another 5 plat), plus occasional bronze (which is sold for 20plat or
given away).

So, with that, it's safe to say that without paying attention at all to
loot, it's easy to make 100 plat a day. If I really wanted to make plat,
it wouldn't be hard to make 500 plat, although it might be somewhat
boring. =)
